text: Ki'amata da gi'ana alaha nala hi sabadhita hai. Ate ko'i fala apane chilake vico' nahim nikalada ate na ko'i aurata garabhavati hudi hai ate na janama didi hai. Para iha sara kujha usa de gi'ana nala huda hai. Ate jisa dina alaha unham nu bula'ega. (Ate puchega) ki mere sarika kithe hana, uha akhanage ki asim tuhade kola iha hi benati karade ham ki sade vicom ko'i vi' inham da da'avedara nahim
